Operation function is the criteria for range queries. For example operation function can return Max, Min or Sum of the two input elements. Default value is the void value that will eliminate a node during operation comparisons. For example if operation return min value then the default value will be largest value (int.Max for if T is int). Or default value will be 0 if operation is sum. Time complexity: O(n).
